properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 29 at 3:55AM MST until March 2 at 4:00AM MST by NWS Salt Lake City UT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5
inches.

* WHERE...Wasatch Mountain Valleys.

* WHEN...From 6 AM Sunday to 4 AM MST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snows will impact the Ogden
valley portion Sunday morning, then spread across the
remainder of the advisory area Sunday afternoon and night.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including
Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit
weather.gov/slc/winter.

For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of
Transportation, visit
http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial
511.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM SUNDAY TO 4 AM MST MONDAY
